data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Ida-Viru, Estonia.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ida-Viru, Estonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Ida-Viru access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 21 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Ida-Viru unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, help the 6,192 believers in Ida-Viru to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Ida-Viru that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 6,192 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ida-Viru, Estonia has a population of 132,000.

We estimate Ida-Viru has 6,192 people who might know Jesus, 56,408 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 69,400 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Ida-Viru.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
